text: Ezɨ ofa gamir gumazibar dapanim Asaria, a Sadokɨn adarazir mav, a kamaghɨn atrivimɨn akam ikaragha ghaze, “Ikiavɨra Itir God bar deraghavɨra uan gumazamizibagh amizɨ, me dagher bar avɨrim inigha an Dɨpenimɨn ize. E dagher kabar avɨrim ame, egha da agɨvan iburazɨ, dagher pozir bar avɨriba ikiavɨra iti.”
